Action item description: PostgreSQL doesn't support the WITH READ ONLY clause for views
Recommended action: Revise your code to use views without the subquery restriction clause.

Action item description: PostgreSQL doesn't support status definitions in CREATE statements for triggers and constraints
Recommended action: Revise your code to turn off the trigger or drop the constraint manually and try again.

Action item description: Specify the precision and scale values for your source column
